Articles.Content: Scott Manley's 1.0 preview video has come out on his YouTube channel!! Discuss!!

SOOOOOO COOOOOOOLLLL!!!!

I love everything about it!!!!!

You can really see the new aerodynamics when he is flying the Kerbal X and he [decouples](https://youtu.be/bLtincmjbR8?t=752) the boosters.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-25T19:04:24Z" title="04/25/2015 07:04  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 25, 2015</time> by worir4**

I find myself trying to hover over the part thumbnails in the VAB/SPH in the videos to see the new part descriptions. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

I think as soon as some mods come out (i.e kerbal engineer, alarm clock) i'll start a Career Mode game, it seems like they've changed quite a bit, and I haven't done career in a while. I *really* like the look of the expanded tech tree.

Also, I saw a *Flyby the Mun* record contract, nice to see there will be more gradual transitions.
Thanks for telling me. 1.0 is the coolest thing ever and returning from school Monday will be the best day ever.
Solid preview.
I cant see the Squadcast or any of the preview videos right now, someone can tell me how the new aerodynamics looks compared to FAR?

> 
> I cant see the Squadcast or any of the preview videos right now, someone can tell me how the new aerodynamics looks compared to FAR?

From scott manley's video, it's really hard to tell. However it for sure isn't a souposphere anymore, high velocities seem to provoke structural failures due to the stress on structures, booster separations are different...

1.0 looks fantastic. Here are my only two negative observations, which are personal preferences, and should not be construed to be criticisms of Squad:

1) I'm glad e-dog's going to continue developing Procedural Fairings because I'd be embarrassed to have fairings which break apart into a gazillion pieces on my rockets. Also, from what I surmise, they're non-structural.

2) So you need a heat shield but don't have to worry about shielding things like the RCS thrusters? 

Overall though, Harv and the team have done awesome work!
Good preview. But did I saw 400 Kn thrust on one of those turbojets?

So...... I must be missing something, but I have been with kerbal since alpha, so that makes me an alpha tester, why am I not privvy to the early release of 1.0?

What makes this dude so special. Comon dude.. I've been with KSP for years, before anyone knew who this dude was. when winter owl was just starting his KSP series.

 I think I should more qualified

There was like 3 parts back when I dived in

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-25T19:55:29Z" title="04/25/2015 07:55  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 25, 2015</time> by darqen27**

> 
> I think I should more qualified

Where are your youtube videos?

That's what these are. They release early to people that will post on youtube and generate more hype.

> 
> So...... I must be missing something, but I have been with kerbal since alpha, so that makes me an alpha tester, why am I not privvy to the early release of 1.0?
> What makes this dude so special. Comon dude.. I've been with KSP for years, before anyone knew who this dude was. when winter owl was just starting his KSP series.
> 
>  I think I should more qualified
> 
> There was like 3 parts back when I dived in

No, you were an alpha **PLAYER**. You are not privy because you are like everyone else in that you get the release when everyone gets the release. I'm sure if you would have made a lot of very popular Youtube videos or twitch streams, Squad would have pick you up for media release. But you didn't. And Squad didn't. If you want to cry about it, there's a corner.

> 
> So...... I must be missing something, but I have been with kerbal since alpha, so that makes me an alpha tester, why am I not privvy to the early release of 1.0?
> What makes this dude so special. Comon dude.. I've been with KSP for years, before anyone knew who this dude was. when winter owl was just starting his KSP series.
> 
>  I think I should more qualified
> 
> There was like 3 parts back when I dived in

Actually there was a experimentals team application program a while back. Also, there's the media team which obviously consists of popular Youtubers.

There, it was last August: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/89168-We-re-looking-for-a-few-good-testers](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/89168-We-re-looking-for-a-few-good-testers)!
I saw KSPTV, and Bill has been replaced with Valentina!![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Here's one from Matt:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/pX_QJuZoW70?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

It covers some more things than Scott's.

Hope he doesn't get angry I called him by his name. Never can remember if it is TheWhiteOwl or TheWinterOwl D:

> 
> I saw KSPTV, and Bill has been replaced with Valentina!![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

wait what

Bill Kerman isn't in the game anymore?

Someone must of offed him.

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/-8lDYrvTILc?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

> 
> I saw KSPTV, and Bill has been replaced with Valentina!![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Bill is four letters, Jeb, Bob and Val have three, thus they save memory. 

That was sarcasm.

Just saw it. I'm excited for real now.

Excuse me while I hop back aboard the Hype Vehicle.

> 
> I saw KSPTV, and Bill has been replaced with Valentina!![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

**Wait.** ***What!?***

This can't be true, he must have just been on vacation. Please tell me this isn't true...
![382.gif](http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/242/631/382.gif)

> 
> **Wait.** ***What!?***
> This can't be true, he must have just been on vacation. Please tell me this isn't true...

Bill was just shown in the stream. There's four start Kerbals now, Val doesn't replace anyone.

Oh, my God. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) This is really, really exciting! Woah, Valentina! The camera moves in construction to focus on parts?! Big wings! HEATSHIELDS!!! Cockpits! Airbrakes! Aerodynamics! (Holy crap, that is fast! TOO FAST! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif))

\*dies\*

A longer, more in-depth one:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/pX_QJuZoW70?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

BTW, Manley didn't mention it, but the ore scanner doesn't need to go all the way around the planets. You need to put it in polar orbit and hit "scan", takes 30 seconds to scan. Boom. Done. I'm quite disappointed in that.
He made a couple of errors. Porkjet didn't make the service bay, RoverDude did.
